attributes.action: Reinstate the triple lock for pensioners April 2023
attributes.additional_details: The pensioners of this country are the worst treated financial in the whole of Europe
attributes.background: I think it is unfair that pensioners have been forgotten by this government I.e. no substantial rise in their state pension

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625622
